events.message: The customer reported that their vehicle was involved in a collision at a busy intersection causing significant front-end damage.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and confirming keywords related to the vehicle accident.
An agent specialized in auto insurance claims was assigned to handle the case and guide the policyholder through next steps.
The insurer sent confirmation to the customer acknowledging receipt of the claim and the commitment to a timely resolution.
The customer was requested to submit police reports, photos of the damaged vehicle, and a copy of the driving license.
The customer uploaded all requested documents including detailed images of the car damage and the official accident report.
The claims team initiated a thorough investigation to verify circumstances surrounding the vehicle collision and liability factors.
Investigation concluded with confirmation that the accident was eligible under the policy terms with no contributory negligence.
A settlement offer was prepared and communicated to the customer, covering repair costs and temporary transportation expenses.
The customer responded expressing satisfaction with the prompt communication and clarity of the settlement proposal.
The claim was officially approved by the claims manager, authorizing the disbursement of funds for vehicle repairs.
The payment covering the repair costs was issued to the authorized service center and confirmation was sent to the customer.
With the payment successfully processed and all requirements met, the claim was officially closed in the system.
